rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员发现蛋白质如何调节细胞中的“跑步”基因组调控中心 (CRG) 的研究人员发现了蛋白质如何协同工作来调节“跑步机”，这是细胞内微管网络用来确保细胞正确分裂的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Researchers-discover-how- Proteins-regulate-treadmilling-in-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Researchers-discover-how- Proteins-regulate-treadmilling-in-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67e745f8-0257-4a1c-ab01-32724f3f956e Fri, 25 Aug 2023 10:11:58 -0400 Researchers discover how proteins regulate 'treadmilling' in cells
将戒烟护理纳入肺癌筛查可提高戒烟率肺癌是美国最致命的癌症，80% 的肺癌死亡与一个危险因素有关：吸烟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Integrating-tobacco-cessation-care-into-lung-cancer-screening-improves-quit-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Integrating-tobacco-cessation-care-into-lung-cancer-screening-improves-quit-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=56faf518-b7c2-4180-bad5-84d0de64635a Fri, 25 Aug 2023 10:08:13 -0400 Integrating tobacco cessation care into lung cancer screening improves quit rates
肝性脑病治疗费用高昂可能导致患者不依从药物治疗明尼苏达大学医学院和药学院的研究人员发现，终末期肝病患者肝性脑病治疗的高费用与患者治疗保留率的降低有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/High-cost-of-hepatic-encephalopathy-treatment-may-lead-to-medication-non-adherence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/High-cost-of-hepatic-encephalopathy-treatment-may-lead-to-medication-non-adherence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e13d9f2-d783-4f54-a369-252601ba2e67 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 10:04:13 -0400 High cost of hepatic encephalopathy treatment may lead to medication non-adherence
研究显示，ChatGPT 3.5 在三分之一的病例中提供了不适当的癌症治疗建议对于许多患者来说，互联网是进行医学主题自我教育的强大工具。随着 ChatGPT 现已触手可及，来自麻省总医院布里格姆医疗保健系统创始成员布莱根妇女医院的研究人员评估了人工智能聊天机器人提供的癌症治疗建议是否符合国家综合癌症网络 (NCCN) 指南的一致性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/ChatGPT-35-provides-inproperty-cancer-treatment-recommendations-in-one-third-of-cases-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/ChatGPT-35-provides-inproperty-cancer-treatment-recommendations-in-one-third-of-cases-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa983216-6e48-447d-b3d4-568909e64627 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 09:47:19 -0400 ChatGPT 3.5 provides inappropriate cancer treatment recommendations in one-third of cases, study shows
母亲的精神负担与孩子的数字使用有关父母花费大量精力思考和减轻与孩子使用手机和互联网相关的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Mothers-mental-load-linked-to-their-childrens-digital-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Mothers-mental-load-linked-to-their-childrens-digital-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=235dc734-7a5e-4039-98d7-8600ac3b9194 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 09:24:03 -0400 Mothers' mental load linked to their children's digital use
儿童福祉受到 COVID-19 大流行持续影响的影响南澳大利亚大学的健康专家表示，虽然不再强制实施新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 封锁，但疫情带来的压力和焦虑仍然挥之不去，尤其是南澳大利亚的年轻人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Childrene28099s-wellbeing-affected-by-the-lingering-effects-of-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Childrene28099s-wellbeing-affected-by-the-lingering-effects-of-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83916364-5aa0-45b3-987f-af2bf194b595 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 05:25:00 -0400 Children’s wellbeing affected by the lingering effects of COVID-19 pandemic
两种小分子抑制剂有助于提高 CRISPR-Cas9 基因编辑的精度和效率《自然通讯》发表的一项新研究展示了如何使用小分子抑制剂来提高 CRISPR-Cas9 基因编辑的精度和效率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Two-small-molecule-inhibitors-can-help-improve- precision-efficiency-of-CRISPR-Cas9-gene-editing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Two-small-molecule-inhibitors-can-help-improve- precision-efficiency-of-CRISPR-Cas9-gene-editing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c275613a-8f89-4563-bad7-c457b63ed679 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 05:24:00 -0400 Two small molecule inhibitors can help improve precision, efficiency of CRISPR-Cas9 gene editing
研究表明，MFGM 和牛奶蛋白可以改善老年人的身体机能芬兰领先乳制品公司 Valio 与顶级营养科学家合作开展了一项关于 MFGM 和牛奶蛋白对老年人身体机能影响的新研究。结果显示，即使没有运动干预，平衡和身体表现也有显着改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/MFGM-and-milk- Protein-may-improve-physical-functioning-of-the-elderly-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/MFGM-and-milk- Protein-may-improve-physical-functioning-of-the-elderly-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=273cab77-b9f7-4f70-90dd-d4088964984d Fri, 25 Aug 2023 05:04:00 -0400 MFGM and milk protein may improve physical functioning of the elderly, study shows
格拉斯哥皇家儿童医院在成功试验后采用儿科 SCRAM一项针对严重不适儿童的先进气道管理的研究导致格拉斯哥一家医院采用了专门设计的创新儿科设备。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Royal-Hospital-for-Children-in-Glasgow-adopts-Paediatric-SCRAM-after-successful-Trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Royal-Hospital-for-Children-in-Glasgow-adopts-Paediatric-SCRAM-after-successful-Trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=efd8d51d-8bc0-420f-84e7-26a21187b27a Fri, 25 Aug 2023 05:01:00 -0400 Royal Hospital for Children in Glasgow adopts Paediatric SCRAM after successful trial
数据显示，Novavax 基于蛋白质的 COVID 疫苗可诱导针对 XBB 亚变体的广泛功能性免疫反应Novavax, Inc. 是一家利用新型 Matrix-M™ 佐剂开发蛋白质疫苗的跨国公司，今天宣布其更新的蛋白质 XBB COVID 候选疫苗可诱导针对 EG.5.1 和 XBB.1.16.6 亚变体的中和抗体反应在小动物和非人类灵长类动物研究中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Novavaxs- Protein-based-COVID-vaccine-induces-broad-function-immune-response-against-XBB-subvariants-data-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Novavaxs- Protein-based-COVID-vaccine-induces-broad-function-immune-response-against-XBB-subvariants-data-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=141d87b2-13ec-406d-adbc-4bbdf414217f Fri, 25 Aug 2023 04:54:00 -0400 Novavax's protein-based COVID vaccine induces broad functional immune response against XBB subvariants, data shows
